title: net/http: docs for http2 appears in package documentation
body:
The h2_bundle.go file doesn't remove the "http2" package documentation string [here](https://github.com/golang/go/blob/90a68935733ef37d41cb520ffeb56f196a356811/src/net/http/h2_bundle.go#L4-L15).

See the bottom of the package documentation at https://tip.golang.org/pkg/net/http/
